  subject  from  Chemistry, 
 Biology/Agricultural Science.  
l) KWAPOLY accepts ‘O’ level credit passes in Fine  
Art, Introduction to Building, Bricklaying & Block 
Laying, Concreting, Walls Floor and Ceiling 
Finishing, Joinery and Carpentry.  
m) RUGIPO accepts ‘O’ level credit pass in English 
Language.  
n) FEDPO-BAU requires ‘O’ level credit passes in 
Mathematics, Physic, and one (1) of Technical 
Drawing or Chemistry.  
o) OSUNPOLY accepts ‘O’ level credit passes in 
Civic Education/Government, Welding/Auto Part 
Merchandizing, and Computer Studies/ICT/Data 
Processing.  
p) FEDPO-EDE requires or its equivalent five (5) ‘O’ 
level credit passes in English Language, 
Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any other 
one (1) subject from Biology, Further 
Mathematics, Geography, Technical Drawing, 
Building Construction, Block Laying, Bricklaying, 
Concerting and Woodwork.  
  
  
  
UTME SUBJECT  
  
i. KAN-POLY requires Mathematics, Physics and 
Chemistry.  
ii. FEDPO-EDE  does  not  accept 
 Basic  
Electronics/Basic Electricity, Economics/ 
Commerce, Wood Work/Auto Mechanics and 
Metal Work.  
iii. FEDPO-ILA requires Mathematics, Physics and 
Chemistry or Technical Drawing. iv. YABATECH 
requires Mathematics, Physics and Technical 
Drawing or Chemistry.  
  
  
 
PROGRAMMES AVAILABLE AT THE NATIONAL DIPLOMA (ND) AND ENTRY REQUIREMENTS
